article.info_description: Google Analytics introduces the following new features that enhance the reporting experience, especially for properties with large and complex data:

article.info_title: The Ads Privacy Hub helps you measure performance more effectively
article.info_description: We know that reaching your ideal customers and measuring ad performance effectively can be daunting in a privacy-first world. However, the evolving landscape around user privacy creates an opportunity to reinvent how, where, and when you engage with your ideal customers. As an advertiser, you’ll need new approaches and tools to help you continue to grow your business in a more privacy-preserving way. Google will continue to support you with best practices, products, and information, and we are

We've updated the search bar at the top of Google Analytics to allow you to find information about your current property or account, and to navigate to the other Google Analytics 4 properties you have access to.

article.info_title: Google Search's guidance about AI-generated content
article.info_description:
At Google, we've long believed in the power of AI to transform the ability to deliver helpful
      information. In this post, we'll share more about how AI-generated content fits into our
      long-standing approach to show helpful content to people on Search.

article.info_title: Announcing the Search Central Live Brazil roadshow
article.info_description:
We're very excited to announce that Search Central Live is coming to Brazil! Following our 
      successful events last year, we're  continuing our mission to help you enhance your site's performance 
      in Google Search. We're organizing three events in Brazil, starting with São Paulo on March 9, then 
      Brasília on March 14, and finishing with Belo Horizonte on March 16.

article.info_title: The Importance of Setting the "lastmod" Tag in Your Sitemap
article.info_description: If you're running a website, it's essential to have a XML sitemap that helps search engines understand the pages it contains and when they are updated. For XML sitemaps, one of the most critical tags that you can include in your sitemap is the "lastmod" tag.

article.info_title: New updates to the Search Console Video indexing report
article.info_description:
Last July we launched a new report in Search Console to help you understand the performance of your videos on 
      Google and identify possible areas of improvement. Today, we are happy to share a few more updates to the report 
      on Search Console to help you achieve those goals more effectively.
